name: NBA Jam 2001
description:
Back of Box - Game Boy Color (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

NBA Jam 2001 slam dunks its way onto your Game Boy® Color!

Over 140 NBA Superstars, Head-to-Head action, all-new hidden teams, Hot Spots, signature moves and Super Dunks that only an All-Star can handle. Lace 'em up and get your game on. NBA Jam 2001... Step up and JAM!!!

(Screenshot captions)
  • All-Star match ups with over 140 NBA Superstars!
  • Catch fire from "downtown"
  • Can you say hangtime?
  • Rock the rim with all-new MONSTER JAMS!!!
